info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued April 05 at 3:54AM CDT until April 05 at 10:00AM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 430 AM CDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN CRAIG...NORTHWESTERN DELAWARE...SOUTHWESTERN OTTAWA AND NORTHERN MAYES COUNTIES... At 354 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Big Cabin, moving northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations in or near the path include... Vinita... Grove... Afton... Adair... Bernice... Ketchum... Bluejacket... Disney... Big Cabin... Pensacola... Honey Creek State Park... Cherokee State Park... Bernice State Park... Cleora... White Oak... This includes Interstate 44 between mile markers 266 and 300. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
